  Item 8.01. Other Events.                                                   
                                                                             
On September 12, 2024, Wells Fargo & Company issued a news release announcing
that Wells Fargo Bank, N.A. had entered into a formal agreement (the
“Agreement”) with the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency related to
the bank’s anti-money laundering and sanctions risk management practices.

Copies of the news release and Agreement are included as Exhibits 99.1 and
99.2 to this report and are incorporated by reference into this Item 8.01.
